Belthassan felt a disturbance in the flow of the Matrix. He barely 
listened to Kali, but he shook off the feeling.

Belthassan: Huh? Neutral zone? Oh, yes, that's right... I'll patch you 
with Thrust, another warrior. Please tell him where you want to meet 
our representative. I need to attend another pressing matter.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Kali:::
> 
> "Will you be agree if the meeting be in a neutral zone??"said the 
> femme 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > Belthassan: You have some good points. I will send one of my 
> warrior 
> > so she can discuss more about an alliance between us. I need your 
> > position so I can send her to you.
> > (he opened a comm to Strika) Strika, I have a mission for you. 
> Report 
> > to the base at once.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > kALI:
> > > 
> > > "Well"said the femme"If you want to keep your neutralyty we 
don't 
> > > have any trouble with us... But here exist factions that they 
> don't 
> > > care about neutral ideals and they might attack you as us... if 
> you 
> > > rather we can offer an alliance and exchange tech-reseach and 
> > militar-
> > > suppor in case that some of us were attacked."
> > >

> > > > Belthassan:
> > > > It is a logical move... for you. However, my faction has made 
> no 
> > > > enemies yet, and I am convinced that fighting your enemies 
will 
> > > bring 
> > > > hatred on us. We are not innocent bystanders, but we are 
> neutrals, 
> > > and 
> > > > I intend to stay as long as possible. If you want to try to 
> > > convince 
> > > > me, I am ready to hear your arguments.
> > > >

> > > > > 
> > > > > Kali opened the com link and said "I'm Kali, Our faction 
> sugesst 
> > > a 
> > > > > reciprocal non-agression deal, plus we can exchange 
knowledge 
> > and 
> > > > > help in case that other team try to fight against each team 
> who 
> > > > > belong to this deal"
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > > > > > Belthassan:
> > > > > > Interesting... Predacons, I am Commander Belthassan of the 
> > > > > > Tripredacus. I would like to get more information on this

> > > > > > Please tell me more.

with 
> > > yours 
> > > > > > > factions"
